馞字的基本解释

馞
bó
香气浓烈：“椒之灌植，实繁有榛，薰林烈薄，馞其芬辛。”

馞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《廣韻》蒲没切，入没，並。］
［《廣韻》普没切，入没，滂。］
香气盛貌。

馞字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【香字部】　馞； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1429第11
【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒲沒切【集韻】薄沒切，?音勃。【玉篇】大香也。【博雅】馝馞，香也。【集韻】或作䭯。　又通作茀。【史記·司馬相如傳】晻薆咇茀。　又【集韻】普沒切，音馞。香貌。

馞字的起名意思

香气浓烈。

Fang
Basic explanation of words
Fang
bó
The aroma is strong: "The pepper is planted, and the hazel is actually multiplied, and the forest is hard and thin, and the fragrant pungent."

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xujixia] [Fragrant Character Department] 　馞; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1429 No. 11
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Pu did not cut [Ji Yun] Thin but not cut,? Yin Bo. [Jade articles] Daxiang also. 【Bo Ya】Fragrant and fragrant. 【Ji Yun】or as a feint.　It is also known as Fu. [Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Biography] Secretly 咇茀.　[Jiyun] Pu didn't cut, sound flanked. Fragrant appearance.
